column1: Table 12:  Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. territories, yearend 2001 and 2002
Authors:  Paige Harrison and Allen Beck
Table 12:  Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. territories, yearend 2001 and 2002

*The number of prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year per 100,000 persons in the resident population.  Midyear population estimates were provided by the U.S Bureau of the Census, International Data Base.
